name: survey-engine
description: Customizable conversational survey platform - template repository

scripts.stop: docker-compose down && pkill -f 'npm run dev' || true
scripts.restart: npm run stop:soft && npm run dev
scripts.setup: npm run setup:backend && npm run setup:frontend
scripts.health: curl http://localhost:4001/health && echo ' - Backend OK' && curl http://localhost:4000 && echo ' - Frontend OK'
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: cd backend && npm run lint:fix && cd ../frontend && npm run lint:fix
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:backend && npm run typecheck:frontend
scripts.check-all: npm run typecheck && npm run lint
scripts.config:init: cp config/survey.example.json config/survey.json && cp config/theme.example.json config/theme.json && echo 'Config files initialized! Edit config/survey.json and config/theme.json to customize your survey.'
